Combining images and plots
========================================================
with **ggplot**

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(jpeg)
library(grid)

img <- readJPEG("image2.jpg")

df <- data.frame(x=sample(1:2000, 100, replace=T), 
                 y=sample(1:2000, 100, replace=T))

x <- seq(0, 2000, by = 1)

```

Le plot

```{r}


ggplot(df, aes(x,y)) + 
  annotation_custom(rasterGrob(img, width=unit(1,"npc"), height=unit(1,"npc")), 
                    -Inf, Inf, -Inf, Inf) +
#  stat_bin2d() +
  scale_x_continuous(expand=c(0,0)) +
  scale_y_continuous(expand=c(0,0)) +
  stat_function(fun=function(x)sin((x-300)*0.006)*1000+1000, geom="line", aes(colour="red")) +
  stat_function(fun=function(x)sin((x+300)*0.006)*1000+1000, geom="line", aes(colour="blue"))

```
